channel.title: Pi 100 Errors
channel.description:
Hey guys I was playing with commands adding and moving and i got 100 errors compiling here are the commands i moved: Ban,unban Here are the commands i added : Pnpc, Npc Here are my errors: [code] src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:289: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.sendMessage("Y ou have IP Muted the user: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:290: class, interface, or enum ex pected Client c2 = (Cli ent)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:291: class, interface, or enum ex pected c2.sendMessage(" You have been muted by: " + c.playerName); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:292: class, interface, or enum ex pected c2.sendMessage(" " +c2.playerName+ " Got IpMuted By " + c.playerName+ "."); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:293: class, interface, or enum ex pected break; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:294: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:299: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:306: class, interface, or enum ex pected Connection.removeNameFromBanList(playerT oBan); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:307: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.sendMessage(playerToBan + " has been u nbanned."); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:308: class, interface, or enum ex pected } catch(Exception e) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:310: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:316: class, interface, or enum ex pected Connection.addNameToBanList(playerToBan) ; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:317: class, interface, or enum ex pected Connection.addNameToFile(playerToBan); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:318: class, interface, or enum ex pected for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i ++) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:318: class, interface, or enum ex pected for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i ++) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:318: class, interface, or enum ex pected for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i ++) { ^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:322: class, interface, or enum ex pected Client c2 = (Client)Server.playe rHandler.players[i]; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:323: class, interface, or enum ex pected c2.sendMessage(" " +c2.playerName+ " Got Banned By " + c.playerName+ "."); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:324: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:329: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.getPA().object(Integer.parseInt(args[1]), c.ab sX, c.absY, 0, 10); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:330: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:334: class, interface, or enum ex pected if (args.length == 3) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:336: class, interface, or enum ex pected int newItemAmount = Integer.pars eInt(args[2]); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:337: class, interface, or enum ex pected if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (new ItemID >= 0)) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:339: class, interface, or enum ex pected } else { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:341: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:344: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:352: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:356: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.getPA().showInterface(Integer.parseInt(args[1] )); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:357: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:362: class, interface, or enum ex pected if (newNPC <= 200000 && newNPC >= 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:364: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.isNpc = true; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:365: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.updateRequired = true; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:366: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:367: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:370: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:373: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:378: class, interface, or enum ex pected if(newNPC > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:380: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.sendMessage("You spawn an Npc. src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:427: class, interface, or enum ex pected Connection.addIp ToFile(Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:428: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.sendMessage("Y ou have IP banned the user: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+" with the host: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:429: class, interface, or enum ex pected Client c2 = (Client)Server.playe rHandler.players[i]; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:430: class, interface, or enum ex pected Server.playerHan dler.players[i].disconnected = true; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:431: class, interface, or enum ex pected c2.sendMessage(" " +c2.playerName+ " Got IpBanned By " + c.playerName+ "."); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:432: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:437: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:443: class, interface, or enum ex pected public void ownerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:448: class, interface, or enum ex pected int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); ^ 100 errors[/code]
And here is my commands.java : http://pastebin.com/F0agmkR5
And also : I added a command in the "publicvoid donor at the complete end but i deleted after mby i deleted a wrong bracket Thanks for anyone who helps.

item.title: Pi 100 Errors
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

replace this with your ban command.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("ban") && playerCommand.charAt(3) == ' ') { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(4); Connection.addNameToBanList(playerToBan); Connection.addNameToFile(playerToBan); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true; Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage(" " +c2.playerName+ " Got Banned By " + c.playerName+ "."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Read full topic
